DOC.criteria: Male female subject ( equal number male female ) Volunteers age least 18 year old 55 year Subjects Body Mass Index ( BMI ) great equal 18.5 30 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg Non exsmokers ; exsmoker define someone completely stop smoke least 12 month day 1 study . Clinical laboratory value within laboratory 's state normal range ; within range , must without clinical significance Have clinically significant disease capture medical history evidence clinically significant finding physical examination and/or clinical laboratory evaluation ( hematology , biochemistry , ECG urinalysis ) Has sign date informed consent document , indicate subject inform pertinent aspect study Willingness ability comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , study procedure Seated pulse rate 45 bpm high 90 bpm screen Seated blood pressure 90/60 mmHg high 140/90 mmHg screen Relationship person involve directly conduct study ( i.e. , principal investigator ; subinvestigators ; study coordinator ; study personnel ; employee contractor sponsor Johnson & Johnson subsidiary ; family ) Presence tongue piercings Presence brace Females pregnant lactate Females childbearing potential male female partner childbearing potential refuse use acceptable contraceptive regimen throughout entire duration study Females pregnant accord positive serum pregnancy test Any medical history condition , use drug medication , investigator determines could compromise subject safety evaluation result .
